powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Assault_Genome
powers.display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a 20% chance to boost your own damage for a short period of time. This boost can stack up to 3 times. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Assault_Core_Genome
powers.display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a 35% chance to boost your own damage for a short period of time. This boost can stack up to 3 times. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Core Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Assault_Radial_Genome
powers.display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a low chance to strike again for a moderate portion of their damage in Smashing damage. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Radial Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Assault_Total_Core_Graft
powers.display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a 55% chance to boost your own damage for a short period of time. This boost can stack up to 3 times. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Total Core Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Assault_Partial_Core_Graft
powers.display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a 40% chance to boost your damage for a short period of time. This boost can stack up to 3 times. This power gives also gives all of your damaging powers a moderate chance to strike again for a small portion of their damage in Smashing damage. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Partial Core Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

This power gives also gives all of your damaging powers a moderate chance to strike again for a moderate portion of their damage in Smashing damage. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Partial Radial Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for +DMG(All), Chance for Doublehit

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Assault_Total_Radial_Graft
powers.display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a high chance to strike again for a moderate portion of their damage in Energy damage. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Total Radial Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Assault_Core_Embodiment
powers.display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a 65% chance to boost your own damage for a short period of time. This boost can stack up to 5 times. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Core Embodiment is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Assault_Radial_Embodiment
powers.display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a very high chance to strike again for a large portion of their damage in Energy damage. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Radial Embodiment is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Control_Genome
powers.display_help: Toggle: Chance for Lethal damage to Controlled enemies. This ability gives a 10% chance for its effects to occur when their conditions are met. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Control_Core_Genome
powers.display_help: Toggle: Chance for +1 Mag to Controls, Chance for Lethal damage to Controlled enemies. This ability gives a 20% chance for its effects to occur when their conditions are met. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Core Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Lethal Damage (Special), Chance for +1 Magnitude

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Control_Radial_Genome
powers.display_help: Toggle: Adds a Chance for Fear to most damaging powers. This ability gives a 35% chance for its effects to occur on each hit. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Radial Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Control_Total_Core_Graft
powers.display_help: Toggle: Chance for +1 Mag to Controls, Chance for Lethal damage to Controlled enemies. This ability gives a 50% chance for its effects to occur when their conditions are met. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Total Core Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Lethal Damage (Special), Chance for +1 Magnitude

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Control_Partial_Core_Graft
powers.display_help: Toggle: Chance for +1 Mag to Controls, Chance for Psionic damage to Controlled enemies. This ability gives a 35% chance for its effects to occur when their conditions are met. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Partial Core Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Psionic Damage (Special), Chance for +1 Magnitude

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Control_Partial_Radial_Graft
powers.display_help: Toggle: Adds a Chance for Fear to most damaging powers. This ability gives a 45% chance for its effects to occur on each hit. Also adds a chance for +1 magnitude to all of your status effects while active. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Partial Radial Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Fear, Chance for +1 Magnitude to Crowd Control effects

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Control_Total_Radial_Graft
powers.display_help: Toggle: Adds a Chance for Fear and a Chance for Immobilize to most damaging powers. This ability gives a 45% chance for its effects to occur on each hit. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Total Radial Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Fear, Chance for Immobilize (Special)

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Control_Core_Embodiment
powers.display_help: Toggle: Chance for +1 Mag to Controls, Chance for Psionic damage to Controlled enemies. This ability gives a 75% chance for its effects to occur when their conditions are met. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Core Embodiment is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Psionic Damage (Special), Chance for +1 Magnitude

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Control_Radial_Embodiment
powers.display_help: Toggle: Adds a Chance for Fear and a Chance for Immobilize to most damaging powers. This ability gives a 70% chance for its effects to occur on each hit. If your target is already Immobilized and Feared, you have an additional 100% chance to stun that target. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Radial Embodiment is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Fear, Chance for Immobilize, Chance for Stun (Special)

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Melee_Genome_1
powers.display_help: This power grants the user a stacking Regeneration buff for each enemy within an 8 foot radius. The effect reaches its maximum strength at 4 enemies. This power also grants some Regeneration with no enemies in range. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Regeneration at all times. Note that Melee Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Incarnate.Hybrid.Melee_Genome_2
powers.display_help: This power grants the user a stacking Regeneration and Resistance buff for each enemy within an 8 foot radius. The effect reaches its maximum strength at 4 enemies. This power also grants a small amount of Regeneration and Resistance even with no foes in range. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Regeneration at all times. Note that Melee Core Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

powers.display_help: While toggled on, this power provides a small boost in Damage, Accuracy, Defense(All), and Special to all leaguemates within an 80 foot radius. Up to five Support Hybrid powers can stack on a single target at any given time. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Endurance Discount at all times. Note that Support Radial Embodiment is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
